mapper.select: SELECT rc.booking_no bookingNo , rc.review_comment_memo reviewCommentMemo , rc.createdate FROM review_comment rc INNER JOIN booking b ON rc.booking_no = b.booking_no WHERE b.booking_company_id = #{companyId}

SELECT ri.booking_no bookingNo , ri.review_img_save_name reviewImgSaveName , ri.review_img_origin_name reviewImgOriginName FROM review r INNER JOIN review_img ri ON r.booking_no = ri.booking_no INNER JOIN booking b ON ri.booking_no = b.booking_no WHERE b.booking_company_id = #{companyId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.createdate DESC) rowNum , r.booking_no bookingNo , ci.customer_img_save_name customerImgSaveName , c.customer_nickname customerNickname , CONCAT(SUBSTR(c.customer_id, 1, 3), '***') customerId , SUBSTR(b.booking_date, 1, 10) bookingDate , (SELECT COUNT(booking_date) FROM booking WHERE booking_state = '방문완료' AND booking_date <= b.booking_date AND booking_company_id = #{companyId}) visitCount , r.createdate createdate , r.star_rating starRating , r.review_memo reviewMemo FROM review r INNER JOIN booking b ON r.booking_no = b.booking_no INNER JOIN customer c ON b.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN customer_img ci ON c.customer_id = ci.customer_id WHERE b.booking_company_id = #{companyId} LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT DAYOFWEEK(booking_company_offday_date) companyOffdayDay , booking_company_offday_date companyOffdayDate FROM booking_company_offday WHERE booking_company_offday_memo = '정기휴무' AND booking_company_id = #{companyId}

SELECT SUBSTR(booking_date, 1, 10) bookingDate
FROM booking WHERE booking_company_id = #{companyId} AND booking_date >= CURDATE()

SELECT booking_company_type_no companyTypeNo , booking_company_opentime openTime , booking_company_closetime closeTime , booking_company_addition_service additionService FROM booking_company_detail WHERE booking_company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO booking_company_offday(booking_company_id , booking_company_offday_date , booking_company_offday_memo) VALUES (#{companyId} , ADDDATE(#{dayOfWeek}, INTERVAL #{cnt} DAY) , '정기휴무')
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT CURDATE() AS DT, dayofweek(CURDATE()) AS num FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT DATE_ADD(DT, INTERVAL 1 DAY), dayofweek(DATE_ADD(DT, INTERVAL 1 DAY)) FROM CTE WHERE DT < ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) ) SELECT DT date FROM CTE WHERE num = #{dayNo}
SELECT booking_company_id companyId , booking_company_offday_date companyOffdayDate , booking_company_offday_memo companyOffdayMemo FROM booking_company_offday WHERE booking_company_id = #{companyId}
SELECT booking_company_type_no companyTypeNo , booking_company_type_content companyTypeContent , parent_no parentNo , group_no groupNo , sequence , depth FROM booking_company_type
